page.title: 18TRANSORT
page.content: {TRANSPORT}in and out of North Leverton is by car, van, bus, lorry or tractor and trailer. Most households have a car. Buses are used by children attending schools in Retford or Worksop and some adults who work in Retford. Shopping by bus is not popular. Produce from farms is taken away by lorry or trailer:cereals to local mills, peas,sugar beet and straw to other areas. Animal feed come in bulk carriers or by van. Milk goes by tanker. Chicks come in small boxes and leave in crates carried on very long lorries.
